name: "George Washington Kissed Here"/"Homecoming King" Online Trivia | Television | 10 Questions
tags: Saved By The Bell: The New Class

questions.text: Ep. 6: Which club was Lindsay not mentioned to be a member of?
questions.explanation:
Chess Club.

	She also signed up for the drama club, and was on the cheerleading team. All of the main characters joined the drama club near the beginning of the episode other than Tommy D.

questions.text: Ep. 6: What was the problem with Mr. Belding's car?
questions.explanation:
Oil leak.

	Belding called Tommy D into his office on a "code red" in order to talk to him about the issues with his car. The car was a 1975 Chevette, which he'd had 10 years longer than his wife.

questions.text: Ep. 6: Who directed the school play?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Belding

	Belding took over the play himself after the original director quit. Scott convinced Belding to let him rewrite parts of the play to modernize it. Weasel got the part of Ben Franklin, Megan played Mrs. Franklin. Scott got the role of George Washington.

questions.text: Ep. 6: Who had a character created and added to the play just before it opened?
questions.explanation:
Tommy D.

	Tommy D saw Scott and Lindsay rehearsing a kissing scene and got jealous. He convinced Mr. Belding to add a part to the play so he could be around more often during rehearsal. The part was as a soldier who wanted to get George Washington to go with him. Tommy's part was to interrupt a kiss between Scott and Lindsay.

questions.text: Ep. 6: Did Scott and Lindsay kiss in the play?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Lindsay rushed off to talk to Tommy D just before the kissing scene. She traded her costume to Vicki, who kissed Scott in the scene. Tommy D and Lindsay both appeared in the final scene as soldiers.

questions.text: Ep. 7: Who announced the Homecoming king and queen finalists?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Belding

	The password for the briefcase Weasel was carrying was his name. He presented the case to Mr. Belding who read off the finalists for both positions. This was during the first scene in the episode. Chrissy and Lindsay were the finalists for queen. Pervis and Chad were the nominees for King. All but Lindsay were new characters for this episode.

Tommy.

	Tommy and Lindsay went back to her house to study their French. Tommy was worried that Lindsay's mom didn't like him, and he was right. Her mom insisted that she start dating other boys as well as Tommy.

questions.text: Ep. 7: Who did Scott take on a date?
questions.explanation:
Lindsay.

	He was supposed to pick her up and take her to meet up with Tommy. Instead he changed their plans and took her to a romantic movie. Tommy was waiting at the Maxx instead of the movie theater. Lindsay was trying to trick her mother into thinking she was dating Scott instead of Tommy.

questions.text: Ep. 7: Who did Lindsay go to the dance with?
questions.explanation:
Chad.

	Chad heard Tommy dump her after her mother refused to allow her to go to the dance with her. Instead of asking out Megan, he burst into their homeroom class and read Lindsay a poem. She agreed to go with him.

questions.text: Ep. 7: Who won the title of Homecoming King?
questions.explanation:
Tommy.

	The gang decided to make Scott look bad, then had Tommy run as a write in candidate. Scott got Chad into the principal's office and tricked him into talking bad about all the various groups of kids in the school. Tommy vacated the crown and then Chad was given the title after Tommy won it.  Megan Jones won as a write-in candidate in the queen's race. She went to the dance with Weasel.
